description: Ask follow-up questions when user intent is unclear or information is missing

required_params.name: clarification_type
required_params.description: What type of clarification is needed

optional_params.name: options
optional_params.description: Specific options to present (e.g., list of matching articles)

optional_params.name: context
optional_params.description: Additional context to include in question

clarification_templates.missing_topic: What should the article be about?
clarification_templates.multiple_matches:
Which one?
1. [Title A] - [details]
2. [Title B] - [details]
Please choose by number or title.
clarification_templates.vague_request: I can help you with: create, update, publish, delete, or list articles. What would you like to do?
clarification_templates.duplicate_title:
We already have an article titled '[TITLE]'. Do you want to:
1. Create a new one with a different title
2. Update the existing article
clarification_templates.missing_details: Could you provide more details about [what's needed]?

error_codes.SEND_FAILED: Couldn't send question. Please try again.

usage_notes: Provide concrete options when possible (numbered lists)
Don't ask multiple questions at once unless closely related
Frame questions positively ('What should...?' not 'You didn't say...')
Include relevant context from user's message
For multiple matches, show distinguishing info (status, date)
Limit lists to 5-10 options (if more, suggest narrowing search)
Accept various response formats: numbers, titles, free text
Follow up with related question if first answer is still unclear
best_practices: Ask one thing at a time when possible
Don't repeat what the user already said
Focus on the missing piece of information
Make it easy to answer (yes/no, pick a number, etc.)
